item.title: Lifeway Foods Inc 10-K
item.description: Lifeway Foods Inc, which is in the Dairy Products [2020] industry, SEC 10-K filing on July 21, 2022 had 28173 (cleaned) words - 600 were utilized for the visualizations. Top Words: 2021 - 308 instances compensation - 301 instances lifeway - 244 instances financial - 243 instances company - 207 instances See the parsed data used in the visualization here.
